widgets.title: Users Day Over Day
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Betting Funnel Today
widgets.nrql: SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%/' AS 'Homepage', where pageUrl like '%/browse/plans' AS 'Place bet', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%login.jsp' AS 'Login',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%/checkout' AS 'Confirm') FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Error Breakdown
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(errorMessage) from Transaction since 1 day ago FACET errorMessage

widgets.title: Slow Pages (>5s)
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE duration >= 5 FACET pageUrl SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Homepage Availability
widgets.nrql: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: Users At Risk
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(username)/10 as 'Users Experiencing Errors' from Transaction where error IS NOT NULL since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Revenue Trend
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal) As 'Revenue' FROM Transaction since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Total Revenue At Risk
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/400 As 'Revenue' FROM Transaction since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Transactions And Error Codes
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*),count(errorCode) from Transaction since 1 day ago FACET appName

widgets.title: Live Users
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 5 minute ago UNTIL 1 minute ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Page Durations
widgets.nrql: SELECT histogram(duration*2,10) FROM PageView since 1 day ago
